content.title: Research Intern at Centre for Research in Higher Education Policies
content.description: During my internship at the Centre for Research in Higher Education Policies (CIPES) in Aveiro, Portugal, I contributed to a Systematic Literature Review (SLR) on the Quality Assurance of the Third Mission of Higher Education Institutions Worldwide. Under the guidance of Dr. Maria Joao Rosa from the University of Aveiro, I gained valuable experience in the SLR research methodology, which I am now applying to my master's thesis. This internship provided me with hands-on experience in conducting rigorous academic research and honed my skills in literature analysis and synthesis.

infoBoxes.title: Key Achievements
infoBoxes.content: Scanned over 600 articles, Developed inclusion/exclusion criteria
